page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: Most families in Dunmow have at least one car,many have two cars.Most of our parents use their cars to drive to work outside Dunmow.We visited Smith's Garage.They sell about 2,000 litres of petrol a week most of it 4 star.They sell Leyland cars,the most popular are metros and maestros.We did a survey of the{traffic}through the High Street and we found that the majority of vehicles were cars.Lorries and vans tend to use the bypass which was completed in 1980.There are buses to Colchester,Bishop's Stortford,Saffron Walden and Chelmsford which call at nearby villages.They run infrequently. The 314 bus to Stebbing only goes on Thursday,the 33 to Saffron Walden goes every hour.There is a{commuter express coach to London which goes from the Post Office 3 times a day.Some parents use this service to travel to{work.
